column5: What rod are you using for ripping and dunking bucktails in the weeds?  What rod (casting or spinning) would you recommend?
Doesn't have to be anything fancy. I use a mh clarus spinning with 30lb braid. Works great.  S.
Rippin i use a 6ft older version GL2 blue blank (spinning) i tied M/Hvy   with 30 pound braid   Dunkin i use a 6ft 3in crucial spinning,  med action  with 10 pound braid
